title: Azure AI Fundamentals (AI-900)
subtitle: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence on Azure
description: Learn the fundamentals of artificial intelligence and machine learning with Microsoft Azure AI services
overview: This foundational course introduces you to the world of artificial intelligence and machine learning using Microsoft Azure. Perfect for beginners, this training covers AI concepts, Azure AI services, and practical applications without requiring programming experience.

personalStory.story: As someone who has guided hundreds of professionals into Azure, I've seen firsthand how the right foundation makes all the difference. I remember working with a team of traditional infrastructure engineers who were skeptical about cloud. After this training, they successfully migrated their first workloads to Azure and became cloud advocates. This course distills everything I wish I knew when I started with Azure.
